title: App I just installed doesn't appear in "App Drawer"
content:
Pixel 3a, Android 11, November security update

Got tired of having to go to Settings to turn NFC on and off, so I installed "NFC Shortcut," a simple-minded app that just provides a slightly faster way to get to the Settings for NFC.

However, even though it installed correctly and shows in the "Apps & Notations->App Info" list, it's not in the App Drawer.

Never had anything like that happen before.

Any idea what's wrong, and how I can get this thing on my home screen?
